title: 2 Easy Ways to Download and Play Fortnite on a Mac

steps.title: Download the Epic Games Launcher.
steps.content: Download the Epic Games Launcher . You must have Mac Mojave 10.14.6 or later to run Fortnite on your computer. [1] X Research source You can download the launcher on the Epic Games' website . If you want to play Fortnite on a Mac through Epic Games Launcher, you won't be able to play across platforms , access the Item Shop, or purchase V-Bucks. You'll only be able to play up to v13.40.

steps.title: Open the Epic Games Launcher.
steps.content: Open the Epic Games Launcher. This looks like the Epic Games logo with a black background. When the launcher opens, you'll be asked to sign into your Epic Games account. If you don't already have an account, you'll need to create one .

steps.title: Go to Fortnite's page.
steps.content: Go to Fortnite's page. Use the search bar at the top to enter "Fortnite" and select the first option.

steps.title: Click Download.
steps.content: Click Download . The download speed will depend on your device, internet, and connection. When it's finished, you'll see the Download button turn into In Library .

steps.title: Click Fortnite.
steps.content: Click Fortnite . This will be in the left panel, underneath the Quick Launch header. Fortnite will open. You can now play Fortnite on your Mac.

steps.title: Go to Fortnite's page on Xbox Cloud Gaming.
steps.content: Go to Fortnite's page on Xbox Cloud Gaming. While the Xbox Game Pass Ultimate is a paid subscription that allows you to access games via a cloud service, there's an exception for free-to-play games such as Fortnite. You'll need a Microsoft Account to play. For best experiences, use Google Chrome .

steps.title: Click Sign in.
steps.content: Click Sign in . This is the green button.

steps.title: Log into your Microsoft account.
steps.content: Log into your Microsoft account. If you don't have one, you'll need to create one.

steps.title: Click Play.
steps.content: Click Play . This is the green button. You can now play Fortnite on your Mac. If you have a controller, you can connect it.
